args.natural_language_statement:
Translate the following into Lean4 (no proofs):

Let n be a natural number, A an n×n real matrix, and S a subset of the set of matrix positions Fin n × Fin n. Define for a permutation σ : Equiv.Perm (Fin n) the term t(σ) := ∏ i, A i (σ i). Let P_S := {σ | ∀ i, (i, σ i) ∈ S} and for t ∈ S let P_{S\{t}} := {σ | ∀ p ∈ S, p ≠ t → σ p.1 = p.2} (i.e. σ agrees with all entries of S except possibly t).

Assume S always contains two entries in the same row or always contains two entries in the same column, i.e.
  (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2, (r,j1) ∈ S ∧ (r,j2) ∈ S ∧ j1 ≠ j2)
  ∨
  (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2, (i1,c) ∈ S ∧ (i2,c) ∈ S ∧ i1 ≠ i2).

Then the combinatorial inequality holds:
  ∑ σ ∈ P_S, |t(σ)| ≤ ∑ t ∈ S, ∑ σ ∈ P_{S\{t}}, |t(σ)|.

Use this combinatorial lemma to state the multilinearity of det in the rows: for any fixed row k, any vectors v w : Fin n → ℝ and scalars a b : ℝ,
  det (matrix obtained from A by replacing row k with (a • v + b • w)) = a * det (A with row k := v) + b * det (A with row k := w).

Translate these statements into Lean4. End each declaration with := by sorry. Use Mathlib import and names consistent with Mathlib4 (Matrix, Equiv.Perm, Finset.univ). Save as a .lean file.

Let P_S := {σ | ∀ i, (i, σ i) ∈ S} and for t ∈ S let P_{S\{t}} := {σ | ∀ p ∈ S, p ≠ t → σ p.1 = p.2} (i.e. σ agrees with all entries of S except possibly t).

Assume S always contains two entries in

args.content:
import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun σ => ∀ i, (i, σ i) ∈ S)
    .sum (fun σ => |(Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)|)
  ≤ S.sum (fun t => (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun σ => ∀ p ∈ S, p ≠ t → σ p.1 = p.2)
      .sum (fun σ => |(Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)|)) := by sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun i => a * v i + b * w i) =
    a * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun i => v i) + b * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun i => w i) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun σ => ∀ i, (i, σ i) ∈ S)
    .sum (fun σ => |(Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)|)
  ≤ S.sum (fun t => (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun σ => ∀ p ∈ S, p ≠ t → σ p.1 = p.2)
      .sum (fun σ => |(Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)|)) := by sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun i => a * v i + b * w i) =
    a * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun i => v i) + b * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun i => w i) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  ((Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun σ => ∀ i, (i, σ i) ∈ S)).sum
    (fun σ => Real.abs ((Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)))
  ≤ S.sum (fun t => ((Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun σ => ∀ p ∈ S, p ≠ t → σ p.1 = p.2)).sum
    (fun σ => Real.abs ((Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i))))) := by sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (Matrix.updateRow A k (fun i => a * v i + b * w i))
    = a * Matrix.det (Matrix.updateRow A k v) + b * Matrix.det (Matrix.updateRow A k w) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- The product term for a permutation σ: ∏ i, A i (σ i). -/
def perm_term {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (σ : Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) : ℝ :=
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun σ => ∀ i, (i, σ i) ∈ S)
    .sum (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ))
  ≤ S.sum (fun t => (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun σ => ∀ p, p ∈ S → p ≠ t → σ p.1 = p.2)
      .sum (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ))) := by sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (Matrix.updateRow A k fun i => a * v i + b * w i)
    = a * Matrix.det (Matrix.updateRow A k v) + b * Matrix.det (Matrix.updateRow A k w) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- The product term for a permutation σ: ∏ i, A i (σ i). -/
def perm_term {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (σ : Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) : ℝ :=
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  let perms := (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))) in
  perms.filter (fun σ => ∀ i, (i, σ i) ∈ S).sum (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ))
  ≤ S.sum (fun t => perms.filter (fun σ => ∀ p ∈ S, p ≠ t → σ p.1 = p.2).sum (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ))) := by sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (Matrix.updateRow A k fun i => a * v i + b * w i)
    = a * Matrix.det (Matrix.updateRow A k v) + b * Matrix.det (Matrix.updateRow A k w) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- The product term for a permutation σ: ∏ i, A i (σ i). -/
def perm_term {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (σ : Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) : ℝ :=
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  ((Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun σ => ∀ i, (i, σ i) ∈ S)).sum
    (fun σ => Real.abs ((Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i))) ≤
  S.sum (fun t => ((Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))).filter (fun τ => ∀ p ∈ S, p ≠ t → τ p.1 = p.2)).sum
    (fun σ => Real.abs ((Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)))) := by sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun j => a * v j + b * w j)
    = a * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k v) + b * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k w) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- The product term for a permutation σ: ∏ i, A i (σ i). -/
def perm_term {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (σ : Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) : ℝ :=
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  let perms : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))) in
  let P_S := perms.filter fun σ => ∀ i, (i, σ i) ∈ S in
  let P_S_t := fun t => perms.filter fun σ => ∀ p (hp : p ∈ S), p ≠ t → σ p.fst = p.snd in
  P_S.sum (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ)) ≤ S.sum (fun t => (P_S_t t).sum fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ)) := by sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun j => a * v j + b * w j) =
    a * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k v) + b * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k w) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- The product term for a permutation σ: ∏ i, A i (σ i). -/
def perm_term {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (σ : Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) : ℝ :=
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  let perms : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))) in
  let P_S : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := perms.filter fun σ => ∀ i : Fin n, (i, σ i) ∈ S in
  let P_S_t : (Fin n × Fin n) → Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := fun t =>
    perms.filter fun σ => ∀ p : Fin n × Fin n, p ∈ S → p ≠ t → σ p.fst = p.snd in
  P_S.sum (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ)) ≤ S.sum fun t => (P_S_t t).sum fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ) := by sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun j => a * v j + b * w j) =
    a * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k v) + b * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k w) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- The product term for a permutation σ: ∏ i, A i (σ i). -/
def perm_term {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (σ : Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) : ℝ :=
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  let perms : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))) in
  let P_S : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := perms.filter (fun σ => ∀ i : Fin n, (i, σ i) ∈ S) in
  let P_S_t : (Fin n × Fin n) → Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := fun t =>
    perms.filter (fun σ => ∀ p : Fin n × Fin n, p ∈ S → p ≠ t → σ p.fst = p.snd) in
  Finset.sum P_S (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ)) ≤
    Finset.sum S (fun t => Finset.sum (P_S_t t) (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ))) := by
  sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun j => a * v j + b * w j) =
    a * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k v) + b * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k w) := by
  sorry

args.query: Finset.filter fun σ => ∀ p ∈ S, p ≠ t → σ p.fst = p.snd Lean4 Finset.filter syntax

args.content:
import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- The product term for a permutation σ: ∏ i, A i (σ i). -/
def perm_term {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (σ : Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) : ℝ :=
  (Finset.univ : Finset (Fin n)).prod fun i => A i (σ i)

/-- Combinatorial lemma about determinant terms supported on a subset S of matrix positions. -/
theorem det_terms_subset_inequality {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (S : Finset (Fin n × Fin n))
  (h : (∃ r : Fin n, ∃ j1 j2 : Fin n, j1 ≠ j2 ∧ (r, j1) ∈ S ∧ (r, j2) ∈ S) ∨
       (∃ c : Fin n, ∃ i1 i2 : Fin n, i1 ≠ i2 ∧ (i1, c) ∈ S ∧ (i2, c) ∈ S))) :
  let perms : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := (Finset.univ : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n))) in
  let P_S : Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := perms.filter (fun σ => ∀ i : Fin n, (i, σ i) ∈ S) in
  let P_S_t : (Fin n × Fin n) → Finset (Equiv.Perm (Fin n)) := fun t =>
    perms.filter (fun σ => ∀ p, (p ∈ S) → (p ≠ t) → (σ p.1 = p.2)) in
  Finset.sum P_S (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ)) ≤
    Finset.sum S (fun t => Finset.sum (P_S_t t) (fun σ => Real.abs (perm_term A σ))) := by
  sorry

/-- Multilinearity of the determinant in each row. -/
theorem det_multilinear_row {n : ℕ} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) (k : Fin n) (v w : Fin n → ℝ) (a b : ℝ) :
  Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun j => a * v j + b * w j) =
    a * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun j => v j) + b * Matrix.det (A.updateRow k fun j => w j) := by
  sorry
